title: Paid leave appears dead in Congress. Here’s what that means.
itunes:title: Paid leave appears dead in Congress. Here’s what that means.
description:
CNN reports on President Biden’s outreach to Democrats on Capitol Hill, as he works to push his economic and climate agenda forward.

In the Atlantic, three professors argue that a lot of people got things wrong about what census data says about the white population of America.

After striking it rich through vaccination lotteries, some lucky winners tell USA Today they have mixed feelings about cashing in. Several say they’re donating money to charity.

Mel Magazine introduces us to a California man who found an unusual path to financial security: seven years of meals at Six Flags Magic Mountain, scored with an annual pass to the park.

CNN reports on President Biden’s outreach to Democrats on Capitol Hill, as he works to push his economic and climate agenda forward.

In the Atlantic, three professors argue that a lot of people got things wrong about what census data says about the white population of America.

After striking it rich through vaccination lotteries, some lucky winners tell USA Today they have mixed feelings about cashing in. Several say they’re donating money to charity.

Mel Magazine introduces us to a California man who found an unusual path to financial security: seven years of meals at Six Flags Magic Mountain, scored with an annual pass to the park.
